title: Thresh Mains Club
body:
I've started up a Thresh main club. If you're interested in joining, add me in game.
Only requirement is at least 100k thresh Mastery. Will work on getting us the best Thresh related tags too so if you have ideas, feel free to leave them and ill try them when we get enough people to make it.

replies.body: A little advice, lose the requirement of 100k and you will get people
If you dont have 100k, are you really a main tho? I'd prefer less people committed to the cause then a bunch of people who only play him abit
I like your style, 100k isn't too much.
Just saying it wonâ€™t allow you to have a active club
My 200-300k account (this one) is perma'd, can i join on my smurf which is currently at 70k?
yeah i checked your approx numbers of games played and i can see you'd have enough mastery. You can join
